stickers.name: ambriel_lost
stickers.alt: Ambriel scratches her head, looking visibly confused. There's a sweat drop of on her cheek, but a music note implies she's still calm.

stickers.name: ambriel_mischief
stickers.alt: Ambriel rubs her hands together as if scheming mischief. She looks frenzied, as her eyes are delirious, her cheeks are flushed, and there's drool from the corner of her mouth.

stickers.name: greythroat_wtf
stickers.alt: GreyThroat makes a dumbfounded face with some mild disgust. '???' shows her bafflement.

stickers.name: blaze_greythroat_run
stickers.alt: Blaze is running away from the foreground. Greythroat is to the side of Blaze with her eyes bugged out in surprise, looking like she narrowly jumped out of Blaze's path.

stickers.name: blaze_doctor_comrade
stickers.alt: Blaze beams as she and Doctor have their arms over each other's shoulders. Despite Doctor's face being obscured by a helment and hood, he also seems very happy.

stickers.name: blaze_kidnap
stickers.alt: Blaze is dragging an unconscious Doctor across the floor. She is surprised by a shadow that falls over them, looking up in surprise to find Amiya. Blaze will likely get in trouble for this.

stickers.name: reed_swet
stickers.alt: Reed has broken out into a sweat. She leans toward the right side of the image, while cautiously looking at the left side as if she were being chased.

stickers.name: broca_grumpy
stickers.alt: Broca is snarling, upset with something. His distress seems to radiate off him.

stickers.name: cardigan_barf
stickers.alt: Only Cardigan's head is seen. Her eyes are screwed close as she barfs up a rainbow.

stickers.name: silverash_sulk
stickers.alt: SilverAsh looks depressed as a gloomy shadow falls over his face. A sign in the background indicates that cats are not allowed and unfortunately, SilverAsh is nothing if not a cat man.

stickers.name: pramanix_throw
stickers.alt: Pramanix has her hands are up as if she were surrendering, a bell tossed over her shoulder as she walks away from the viewer. It seems as if she were walking away in exasperation.

stickers.name: schwarz_tea
stickers.alt: Schwarz holds a steaming hot cup of tea. A gleam indicates that the tea is of high quality and/or taste.

stickers.name: vigna_nom
stickers.alt: Vigna has her cheeks stuffed with crumbs around her mouth. In her hands is what looks like an originium slug with a bite taken out of its spikes.

stickers.name: gavial_rage
stickers.alt: Gavial is incredibly angry and posed for combat. In her left hand is her healing staff, while her right hand gestures for an opponent to engage her in a fight.

stickers.name: estelle_despair
stickers.alt: Estelle is making a face as if she were deeply uncomfortable and/or in pain. She has broken out into a sweat and a tiny bird sits on her left horn.

stickers.name: nearl_wince
stickers.alt: Nearl squints her eyes and recoils in surprise from the foreground. A bright light is emitted from the bottom left corner of the image.

stickers.name: kroos_happy
stickers.alt: Kroos beaming as she holds an apple in her right hand and her crossbow in her left.

stickers.name: yato_worry
stickers.alt: Yato fretfully wipes sweat from her brow with the back of her hand.

stickers.name: yato_happy
stickers.alt: Yato smiles while bringing her left hand to cup her cheek, looking refreshed. In her right hand is a beverage with the cap removed.

stickers.name: hibiscus_tasty
stickers.alt: Hibiscus holds up a plate with a burger. The burger's filling is notably very green. She's smiling with her tongue sticking out at the side of her mouth, believing her burger will be delicious.

stickers.name: lava_search
stickers.alt: Lava overturns an empty plastic bag in confusion, looking for a bag of potato chips.

stickers.name: lava_nom
stickers.alt: Lava is enjoying what seems to be a fast food meal of a burger and a coke. A shadowy Hibiscus looms behind Lava, twinkle in her eyes.

stickers.name: durin_yawn
stickers.alt: Durin yawns, reaching a hand up to dab a tear at the corner of her eye with an oversized sleeve.

stickers.name: durin_owch
stickers.alt: Durin looks mildly annoyed as her hands reach up to her head. There's a bandage in the shape of a cross on her head, indicating she was hurt there.

stickers.name: dobermann_mad
stickers.alt: Dobermann angrily holds up her whip, tightening it with both hands. It's a threat that she's about to dole out some discipline.

stickers.name: rangers_tail
stickers.alt: Rangers huffs out a contented sigh with his eyes closed as he pets his curled-up tail.

stickers.name: beagle_swet
stickers.alt: Beagles sweats profusely in a panic as she hides her report card behind her back.

stickers.name: fang_idea
stickers.alt: Fang thumps her left fist onto her right palm in revelation, having just come up with an idea.

stickers.name: noir_mask
stickers.alt: Noir has taken off his usual mask, holding it in his right hand. He uses his left to hold a bunny mask based on Amiya to his face, getting a laugh out of silliness.

stickers.name: kroos_nap
stickers.alt: Kroos is sleeping soundly with a bubble from her nose. In the background, the alarm clock jumps up as it goes off.

stickers.name: amiya_love
stickers.alt: Amiya smiles as she lovingly holds a bunny doll that looks like her. The doll has a red ribbon tied into a bow around its neck.

stickers.name: kaltsit_huff
stickers.alt: Kal'tsit crosses her arms with her eyes closed in thought. She looks both annoyed and perplexed.

stickers.name: mostima_precious
stickers.alt: Mostima's eyes shine excitedly as she is presented with a box of donuts by a pair of disembodied hands. A heavenly light is emitted from the donuts in the box, making the air around Mostima sparkle.

stickers.name: breeze_floof
stickers.alt: Breeze grins as she affectionately pets a fox. Alongside them are the words 'mofu mofu' that indicate the fox is very soft and fluffy to the touch.

stickers.name: bison_note
stickers.alt: Bison takes notes with a clipboard, a pen, and a deadpan expression.

stickers.name: may_untitledduck
stickers.alt: May stands dumbfounded, scratching her head as she looking for her gun. Behind her is a duck with May's gun in its mouth, waddling away from May. This sticker is drawn in a different art style to the rest of the sticker pack, instead emulating the art style of the game 'Untitled Goose Game.'

stickers.name: ethan_trick
stickers.alt: Ethan grins as he does a trick with his yo-yo, creating an image with the yo-yo's string.

stickers.name: waaifu_annoyed
stickers.alt: Waai Fu seems irritated and disheveled as she uses her claws to scratch something.

stickers.name: mostima_offer
stickers.alt: Mostima grins as she holds out and offering of sausages to someone. Only the other person's hand is visible, shown to be gesturing a polite decline of Mostima's offer. The two sausages she's offering are skewered onto the tip of the ancient, dangerous staff, the Black Lock.

stickers.name: waaifu_think
stickers.alt: Waai Fu is pondering with her right hand under her chin, and her left arm resting along the bottom of the image as if it were a table.

stickers.name: ethan_fail
stickers.alt: Ethan lies facedown on the ground. He's tied up by his own yo-yo, his arms pinned to his sides. The word 'fail' appears above him in both Chinese and English.

stickers.name: may_drown
stickers.alt: May splashing around in water with a panicked expression. Although it gives the impression that she's drowning, it's important to note that she only seems to be waist-deep in water, and that actual drowning is much quieter.

stickers.name: siege_angry
stickers.alt: Siege holds her hammer in her right hand as she stands over the limp body of the Doctor. The Doctor's head has been smashed into the wall, leaving a sizable hole that their head currently rests in. Based on Siege's anger, they probably upset Siege somehow.

stickers.name: warfarin_sleep
stickers.alt: Warfarin is asleep, wearing a sleep mask and cuddling a bat plushie that looks like her. Of course, as a vampire, she's also hanging upside down.

stickers.name: nightingale_tweet
stickers.alt: Nightingale is on her phone with her back to the viewer. A small icon above her head indicates that she is using the Terra equivalent of Twitter.

stickers.name: firewatch_button
stickers.alt: Firewatch stands before a button with a deadpan expression. The lid on the button is labelled 'DANGER' and has been removed out of the way. The button makes a sound as Firewatch's finger presses down on it.

stickers.name: kroos_quiet
stickers.alt: Kroos is about to say her famous line 'kokodayo~!' but it cut off by the Doctor slapping a hand over her mouth. As a result, she is only able to get the first 'ko-' out before she opens her eyes in surprise.

stickers.name: rope_huh
stickers.alt: Rope is confused as she holds up her hook, finding a torn tentacle pierced on one of the claws.

stickers.name: breeze_floof_en
stickers.alt: Breeze grins as she affectionately pets a fox. Alongside them is the word 'Floofing' that indicates the fox is fluffy.

stickers.name: ethan_fail_en
stickers.alt: Ethan lies facedown on the ground. He's tied up by his own yo-yo, his arms pinned to his sides. The word 'failed' appears above him.

stickers.name: firewatch_button_en
stickers.alt: Firewatch stands before a button with a deadpan expression. The lid on the button is labelled 'DANGER' and has been removed out of the way. The button beeps as Firewatch's finger presses down on it.

stickers.name: executor_whack
stickers.alt: Executor performs a 'percussive maintenance' on a screen with an antenna on its side.

stickers.name: executor_sign
stickers.alt: Executors holds out a document in his left hand and a pen in his right, telling someone to sign.

stickers.name: flamebringer_nay
stickers.alt: Flamebringer declines something in a similar fashion to the Drake meme format. He holds out his hand as if to push something away, his body leaning away from whatever it is. For best meme effectiveness, this image should be paired with the other Flamebringer sticker in the pack.

stickers.name: flamebringer_yay
stickers.alt: Flamebringer approves of something with a thumbs up. His other elbow is on the handle of his sword as he leans casually. For best meme effectiveness, this image should be paired with the other Flamebringer sticker in the pack.

stickers.name: vermeil_pout
stickers.alt: Vermeil is on the verge of tears. She's pouting, her eyes are teary, and her body is shaking.

stickers.name: vermeil_sniff
stickers.alt: Vermeil sniffs the air with her eyes closed and her ears perked up. The sniffing sound effect is written in Chinese.

stickers.name: vermeil_frustration
stickers.alt: In a fit of frustration, Vermeil throws her metal, prosthetic arm at the ground.

stickers.name: amiya_spray
stickers.alt: Amiya wears a gas mask as she sprays a bottle of disinfectant.

stickers.name: magallan_hug
stickers.alt: Magallan beams as she hugs Emperor from behind. Emperor sighs in exasperation.

stickers.name: magallan_run
stickers.alt: Magallan is running from something, kicking up a trail of dust in her wake.

stickers.name: silence_scan
stickers.alt: Silence scans Doctor's head with a handheld device. It makes a sound as it completes the scan.

stickers.name: silence_shout
stickers.alt: Silence dramatically says something. Her right hand is closed into a fist and her expression is dubious. Chances are that someone made a mistake in the labratory.

stickers.name: radiation_sign
stickers.alt: A yellow sign warning of radiation. On the sign is the image of a gas mask with cat ears. Below the image is the word 'RADIATION.'

stickers.name: jessica_depression
stickers.alt: Jessica sits in a crater with her knees under her chin. Her tail is curled around her body as she hugs her knees. A shovel lies at her feet. The words 'I'm fine' caption the image.

stickers.name: meteorite_camera
stickers.alt: Meteorite snaps a photo with a handheld camera held up to her deadpan face.

stickers.name: meteorite_explosion
stickers.alt: Cool operators don't look at explosions, they blow things up and walk away. Meteorite does exactly this with a bored expression, unphased by the explosion behind her.

stickers.name: executor_whack_en
stickers.alt: Executor performs a 'percussive maintenance' on a screen with an antenna on its side. It makes a loud 'Thwack-' sound.

stickers.name: executor_sign_en
stickers.alt: Executors holds out a document in his left hand and a pen in his right, telling someone, 'Sign here.'

stickers.name: vermeil_sniff_en
stickers.alt: Vermeil sniffs the air with her eyes closed and her ears perked up. The sniffing sound effect is written in English.

stickers.name: amiya_spray_en
stickers.alt: Amiya wears a gas mask as she sprays a bottle of disinfectant. The bottle makes a 'Pschitt' sound.

stickers.name: silence_scan_en
stickers.alt: Silence scans Doctor's head with a handheld device. It goes 'Beep!' as it completes the scan.

stickers.name: jessica_depression_en
stickers.alt: Jessica sits in a crater with her knees under her chin. Her tail is curled around her body as she hugs her knees. A shovel lies at her feet. Under the crater are the words, 'This is fine.'

stickers.name: silverash_yo
stickers.alt: SilverAsh is laying on his stomach. A person seems to have caught his attention, as he raises his left hand in greeting. According to Xue's translation, SilverAsh says, 'Yo!' A rainbow is emitting from his back for some reason.
stickers.caption: Yo!

stickers.name: silverash_frustrated
stickers.alt: SilverAsh is turned away from the viewer, fuming with his arms crossed. His tail, on the other hand, is wagging energetically.

stickers.name: pramanix_dread
stickers.alt: Pramanix trembles and sweats bullets with an anxious expression. According to Xue's translation, Pramanix exclaims something along the lines of, 'Forced into a life of labor!!'
stickers.caption: Forced into a life of labor!!

stickers.name: pramanix_murder
stickers.alt: Pramanix looms menacingly, radiating an aura of doom and gloom. There's a shadow over her eyes as they glint with a desire for violence. In her right hand is a bell, stained with blood as if it had been used to inflict blunt force trauma. According to Xue's translation, the words around Pramanix say, 'I'm starting to feel like murder.'
stickers.caption: I'm starting to feel like murder

stickers.name: cliffheart_pout
stickers.alt: Cliffheart sits in the corner of the image, huddled with her knees to her chin and her arms wrapped around her knees. She has a pitiful expression and a tear rolling down from her left eye.

stickers.name: cliffheart_beam
stickers.alt: Cliffheart beams while ready and posed to climb with her hook in her hands.

stickers.name: courier_embarassed
stickers.alt: Courier sheepishly smiles, floundering and embarassed. His ears are also blushing in embarassment.

stickers.name: courier_confused
stickers.alt: Courier taps his right index finger to his chin, confused. There are not one, not three, but eight question marks scattered around his head to show how confused he is.

stickers.name: matterhorn_sneeze
stickers.alt: Matterhorn lets out a great, big sneeze, going 'Achoo!!'
stickers.caption: Achoo!!

stickers.name: matterhorn_aaa
stickers.alt: Matterhorn stares up at something with apprehension and disbelief. According to Xue's translating, Matterhorn is going, 'aaaaaaaaaa'
stickers.caption: aaaaaaaaaa

stickers.name: zima_muted
stickers.alt: Zima holds her axe in her hands with a displeased expression and blank eyes. There is the symbol of 'mute' or 'no volume' above her head. Zima is silent, but the shadow over her face indicates she has some choice words for whoever muted her.

stickers.name: zima_rage
stickers.alt: Zima has a furious expression as she wields her axe. There is the shadow of a bear with its teeth bared and eyes glinted with murder behind Zima. Presumably, this is Zima's 'animal' self since she is based off a bear.

stickers.name: gummy_sing
stickers.alt: Gummy smiles with her eyes closed and her right hand over her heart. It almost looks like she's singing, although there's no music notes to indicate so.

stickers.name: gummy_cheer
stickers.alt: Gummy grins with starry-eyed joy with both her arms raised. She holds her frying pan in her left hand.

stickers.name: istina_sulk
stickers.alt: Istina frowns like she's had something sour or foul tasting. A cloud of gloom seems to loom over her head.

stickers.name: istina_glasses
stickers.alt: Istina has a sharp look in her eyes as there's a glint at the corner of her right eye. She's pushing up her glasses with her left hand. According to Xue's translation, the words around Istina say, 'Glasses of knowledge.'
stickers.caption: Glasses of knowledge

stickers.name: silence_happy
stickers.alt: Silence smiles with her eyes closed and her hands brought together. It gives a sense of her being proud.

stickers.name: ifrit_slug
stickers.alt: Ifrit is happily playing with originium slugs. There's one slug on her head, one in her right hand, and one under her left arm.

stickers.name: mayer_frenzy
stickers.alt: Mayer grins with frenzied elation, her left index finger hovering over a remote in her right hand. According to Xue, the Chinese text above her head translates to, 'It's fine if I do it again! There's no way it'll hurt!'
stickers.caption: It's fine if I do it again! There's no way it'll hurt!

stickers.name: mayer_dog
stickers.alt: One of Mayer's robotic otters stands on its hind legs. A question mark above its head indicates that it is confused, but its tail is wagging furiously like a dog.

stickers.name: saria_crack
stickers.alt: A petrified Saria is frozen in shock. A part of her head cracks and chips away.

stickers.name: ptilopsis_notif
stickers.alt: Ptilopsis has a blank expression as a red notification icon appears on her head.

stickers.name: ifrit_drone
stickers.alt: Ifrit is carried by Silence's drone. The drone holds Ifrit by the torso as her head, arms, and legs dangle in the air. Ifrit is holding a long, gray object in her right hand.

stickers.name: ifrit_frustration
stickers.alt: In a fit of frustration, Ifrit throws an object to the ground. The object is vaguely shaped like a rifle, although it could also be a metal pipe.

stickers.name: texas_tape
stickers.alt: Texas tightly tapes a package with yellow duct tape. The package is covered in a black tarp and shaped like a person. A piece of white paper, probably the postal sticker, is where the 'head' is.

stickers.name: texas_pocky
stickers.alt: Texas holds a box of chocolate pocky in her left hand, pouring it into her right hand awaiting her bounty. A piece of broken pocky lies at her feet and her expression is forelorn. The box seems to be empty.

stickers.name: exusiai_pie
stickers.alt: Exusiai holds a slice of pie in both her hands. There are crumbs and pie filling around her mouth. Her eyes are wide and shining, as if she's having a transcending experience.

stickers.name: exusiai_fallen
stickers.alt: A wasted Exusiai lies face-down on the ground. Her halo is a bit away, fallen off her head.

stickers.name: croissant_feed
stickers.alt: Croissant cheerfully shoves a croissant in Doctor's mouth.

stickers.name: croissant_discount
stickers.alt: Croissant's gloved hand is shown holding a round sticker with spiked edges. The sticker reads '50% OFF'

stickers.name: sora_embarassed
stickers.alt: Sora is recoiling from something with her eyes screwed closed and a blush on her face. She appears to be embarassed by something.

stickers.name: emperor_sip
stickers.alt: Emperor loudly sips from a wine glass. The speech bubble above him presumably says 'Sip—' in Chinese.

stickers.name: mayer_frenzy_en
stickers.alt: Mayer grins with frenzied elation, her left index finger hovering over a remote in her right hand. The text above her head says, 'It won't hurt!'

stickers.name: emperor_sip_en
stickers.alt: Emperor loudly sips from a wine glass. The accompanying speech bubble says 'Sip—'

stickers.name: amiya_headache
stickers.alt: Amiya holds her head while scrunching up her face in extreme distress. There is a mirage behind her repeating this image of her with a headache.

stickers.name: amiya_huh
stickers.alt: Amiya looks up in shock as if she just heard bad news. Next to her head is a very large '!?'

stickers.name: amiya_trouble
stickers.alt: Amiya has her right hand on her hip while her left pinky scratches at her rabbit ear. Amiya has a thought bubble of text. The official translation is, 'here we go again'

stickers.name: amiya_punch
stickers.alt: Amiya is shown to be very angry, with a vein showing on her cheek. She punches the Doctor, causing his head to turn toward the viewer. The Doctor's face is obscured by his helmet, but a comical spray of blood comes from where his mouth should be.

stickers.name: amiya_fume
stickers.alt: Amiya fumes while pouting and scrunching up her face in frustration.

stickers.name: amiya_pft
stickers.alt: Amiya raises her right hand near her mouth as she looks like she's trying to hold back a laugh. A puff of air managed to escape, betraying her amusement.

stickers.name: amiya_point
stickers.alt: Amiya points at someone that isn't in frame. She appears to be smiling as she says something. According to the official translation, Amiya is saying, 'are you even human'

stickers.name: amiya_cry
stickers.alt: Amiya tearily pouts while trying to wipe her tears with her right hand.

stickers.name: amiya_cheer
stickers.alt: Amiya raises both arms in the air. Her mouth is not drawn, but her eyes are closed happily. She seems to be in a good mood as sparkles appear around her.

stickers.name: amiya_hug
stickers.alt: Amiya hugs a giant plush that looks like the bunny version of her. The plush looks to be at least twice Amiya's height. Her cheeck is squished against the plush, and the sparkles around her make her seem quite happy.

stickers.name: amiya_peek
stickers.alt: Treating the bottom of the image like a table, Amiya uses both her hands to push herself up and peek over the edge at the viewer. Her right ear twitches curiously.

stickers.name: amiya_work
stickers.alt: Amiya looks down at a piece of paper with a shadow over her face. Despite her smile, it does not seem like good news. According to the official translation, she shouts, 'back to grinding'

stickers.name: amiya_wow
stickers.alt: Amiya's eyes shine like stars while she wears a very excited grin. Her right fist is raised up as if she were cheering for some great victory.

stickers.name: amiya_embarassed
stickers.alt: Amiya sweats and blushes with embarassed. She poses like she was just caught doing something, holding up her left arm to futilely shield herself.

stickers.name: amiya_mini
stickers.alt: Amiya beams as she holds up miniature plush of Bunny Amiya in her right hand.

stickers.name: amiya_despair
stickers.alt: Amiya is reduced to grayscale as she gloomily looks down in despair.

stickers.name: amiya_trouble_en
stickers.alt: Amiya has her right hand on her hip while her left pinky scratches at her rabbit ear. She has a thought bubble that says, 'here we go again'

stickers.name: amiya_point_en
stickers.alt: Amiya points at someone that isn't in frame. She appears to be smiling as she says, 'are you even human'

stickers.name: amiya_work_en
stickers.alt: Amiya looks down at a piece of paper with a shadow over her face. Despite her smile, it does not seem like good news. She shouts, 'back to grinding'

stickers.name: shaw_poke
stickers.alt: Shaw sweats and shakes uncomfortably as a large disembodied hand pokes her cheek.

stickers.name: chen_arrest
stickers.alt: Ch'en is running while holding handcuffs in her left hand. According to Xue, the Chinese text above her translates to 'SOUND THE ALARM!'
stickers.caption: SOUND THE ALARM!

stickers.name: chen_hoshi_dread
stickers.alt: Hoshiguma and Ch'en stand side by side, both sporting open expressions of dread and disapproval with an air of gloom above them.

stickers.name: feater_power
stickers.alt: FEater raises both her arms while controlling her giant mecha arms. Above her is the word 'Power!!'

stickers.name: feater_bored
stickers.alt: FEater crosses her arms with a sullen expression. According to Xue, the Chinese text above her translates to 'sooooo boooooriiiiiingggg.'
stickers.caption: Sooooo boooooriiiiiingggg

stickers.name: feater_tantrum
stickers.alt: FEater lays belly-down on the ground as she repeatedly hits the ground with her fists. Her expression distressed, she seems to be having a tantrum.

stickers.name: swire_money
stickers.alt: Swire throws LMD into the air as she walks, making it look like money is raining around her.

stickers.name: matoimaru_cook
stickers.alt: Matoimaru grins while holding an onigiri in her right hand and a rice paddle in her left. She's also wearing an apron, implying that she was the one who cooked the rice.

stickers.name: swire_cheers
stickers.alt: Swire beams as she holds out a wine glass in her left hand, looking like she wants to celebrate with someone by clinking glasses and saying 'cheers.'

stickers.name: chen_nom
stickers.alt: Ch'en's eyes shine like stars as she eats something tasty from a bag. The dish takes the form of small, brown circles. The words on the bag are difficult to read due to image quality, but Xue approximates that it says, 'hand-fried egg.'
stickers.caption: Hand-fried egg

stickers.name: hoshi_hungry
stickers.alt: Hoshiguma drools as she daydreams about delicious food.

stickers.name: swire_rich
stickers.alt: Swire grins as she wears sunglasses with a dollar sign-shaped frame attached to them. She adjusts her glasses with her left hand as she form a finger gun with her right.

stickers.name: shirayuki_invis
stickers.alt: Shirayuki is running while invisible. Only her line art is shown, and instead of being colored in she is filled in with the pattern indicative of transparency in photo-editing software.

stickers.name: shaw_caution
stickers.alt: Shaw holds a fire hose nozzle at the viewer, the nozzle glinting as a warning. Behind Shaw is a giant yellow triangle indicative of caution.

stickers.name: hoshi_thumbs_up
stickers.alt: Hoshiguma smiles encouragingly as she holds up both her hands with thumbs up.

stickers.name: chen_alert
stickers.alt: Ch'en's expression is very serious as if something important has just happened. In her hands is a newspaper that she is no longer looking at. According the Xue, the Chinese text beside Ch'en translate to, 'It's the smell of crime.'
stickers.caption: It's the smell of crime

stickers.name: fumizuki_thanks
stickers.alt: Fumizuki bows her head in thanks. According to Xue, the text on the left reads, 'Thank you for your hard work'
stickers.caption: Thank you for your hard work

stickers.name: chen_salute
stickers.alt: Ch'en stands at attention and salutes with her right arm. According to Xue, she says, 'Orders received.'
stickers.caption: Orders received.

stickers.name: chen_shoo
stickers.alt: Ch'en furiously swats at some originium slugs with her sword. According to the official translation, the sound effect is 'shoo shoo shoo'

stickers.name: empty_wallet
stickers.alt: An empty wallet is held by Wei Yenwu's left hand, while his right hand motions to how empty it is.

stickers.name: hoshi_cheer
stickers.alt: Hoshiguma smiles as she holds up a mug of foamy beer. Above her is the word, 'Cheer!'

stickers.name: talulah_tea
stickers.alt: Talulah stoically holds the handle of a teacup in her right hand while holding the saucer in her left.

stickers.name: shirayuki_peek
stickers.alt: Shirayuki peeks her head out from behind a concrete pole convered in papers.

stickers.name: weasel_top
stickers.alt: The head and forearms of a white long-tailed weasel. A black bandana is tied around its left forearm, a reference to Shirayuki.

stickers.name: hoshi_stroll
stickers.alt: Hoshiguma smiles as she motions for someone to come closer with her right hand. According to Xue, she says, 'Go on a trip with me.'
stickers.caption: Go on a trip with me

stickers.name: amiya_think
stickers.alt: Bunny Amiya sits in the corner of the image. A thought bubble indicates that she's thinking of carrots. According to Xue, the words on the left read, 'Earnest contemplation'
stickers.caption: Earnest contemplation

stickers.name: shaw_warning
stickers.alt: The image is draw in the style of a safety sign. The background is a light green while everything else is drawn as black silhouettes. Shaw is drawn standing on an elevated platform and using a water hose to blast a person on the lower platform into falling over. According to the official translation, along the bottom it reads, 'Watch Your Step'

stickers.name: weasel_middle
stickers.alt: The middle section of a white long-tailed weasel. Without context, it just looks like a pair of parallel lines.

stickers.name: wei_chilling
stickers.alt: Wei Yenwu beams with his eyes closed and his arms crossed. According to Xue, he says, 'Don't mention it!'
stickers.caption: Don't mention it

stickers.name: amiya_fear
stickers.alt: Amiya smiles through the pain with teary eyes as she trembles.

stickers.name: chen_amiya_glomp
stickers.alt: Ch'en is taken aback as Bunny Amiya jumps onto Ch'en's face.

stickers.name: weasel_bottom
stickers.alt: The end section of a white long-tailed weasel, although the tail itself in this image is quite short so the length probably went elsewhere. Included are the tail, hind legs, and hind quarters of the weasel.

stickers.name: sheep_speak
stickers.alt: The image is zoomed in on a face that looks a lot like Temmie from Undertale. According to Xue, the words along the right read, 'You speak in sheep noises.'
stickers.caption: You speak in sheep noises

stickers.name: skele_hardship
stickers.alt: A skeleton with rabbit ears taped to its skull, facing left. According to Xue, the words next to it read, 'Killing me with hardship.'
stickers.caption: Killing me with hardship

stickers.name: skele_too
stickers.alt: A skeleton with rabbit ears attached to its skull. Cracks above and under its left eye socket are taped over. The skeleton faces right. According to Xue, the words next to it read, 'I as well.'
stickers.caption: I as well.

stickers.name: fumizuki_thanks_en
stickers.alt: Fumizuki bows her head in thanks. She says, 'My deepest gratitude.'

stickers.name: chen_salute_en
stickers.alt: Ch'en stands at attention and salutes with her right arm. She says, 'Affirmative.'

stickers.name: chen_shoo_en
stickers.alt: Ch'en furiously swats at some originium slugs with her sword. She makes a 'Shoo Shoo Shoo' sound.

stickers.name: hoshi_stroll_en
stickers.alt: Hoshiguma smiles as she motions for someone to come closer with her right hand. She says, 'Let's take a stroll.'

stickers.name: amiya_think_en
stickers.alt: Bunny Amiya sits in the corner of the image. A thought bubble indicates that she's thinking of carrots.

stickers.name: shaw_warning_en
stickers.alt: The image is draw in the style of a safety sign. The background is a light green while everything else is drawn as black silhouettes. Shaw is drawn standing on an elevated platform and using a water hose to blast a person on the lower platform into falling over. Along the bottom it reads, 'Watch Your Step'

stickers.name: wei_chilling_en
stickers.alt: Wei Yenwu beams with his eyes closed and his arms crossed. He says, ''Tis but a trifling matter.'

stickers.name: group_eh
stickers.alt: Three people face the viewer, the Medic NPC on the left, Amiya in the center, and Dobermann on the right. Amiya and the Medic smile while Dobermann looks like she wants to stab someone. They're not colored in, and stand in front of a black background. Above them is a single word, which according to Xue means, 'Eh?'
stickers.caption: Eh?

stickers.name: shaw_talu_hose
stickers.alt: Talulah faces the viewer as she flinches. Behind her, Shaw has a water hose pointed at Talulah's back, spraying her with a torrent of water. According to Xue, Shaw says, 'STAY CALM!'
stickers.caption: STAY CALM!/SOBER UP!

stickers.name: liskarm_franka_angry
stickers.alt: Liskarm's eyes glint with danger as she uses her shield to bash a straw dummy. A picture of Franka's face is taped to the dummy's head.

stickers.name: franka_liskarm_match
stickers.alt: Franka and Liskarm stand beside each other while simultaneously holding a fist to the other's' face. According to Xue, the words above them say, 'Sizing up a prospective match'
stickers.caption: Sizing up a prospective match

stickers.name: jessica_cold
stickers.alt: Jessica shivers as she wraps her right arm around her torso and puts her left hand in her mouth to stop her teeth from clattering. It is quite apparent from her state that she is miserable. According to Xue, the words beside her read, 'So cold!'
stickers.caption: So cold

stickers.name: texas_exu_praise
stickers.alt: Texas and Exusiai stand next to each other and smile, although Exusiai is crouched to be as short as Texas's shoulder. Texas has her right hand on her hip while patting Exusiai's head with her left. Exusiai has both her arms to her chest, her fists under her chin, blushing as she soaks in her friend's praise. According to Xue, the praise says, 'You're really great!'
stickers.caption: You're really great

stickers.name: texas_exu_friends
stickers.alt: Texas and Exusiai stand shoulder to shoulder, each of them wrapping an arm around the other. With their other hands, Texas holds a glass of wine while Exusiai holds a wine bottle. Both are smiling widely while shades. According to Xue, the words above them read, 'To our friendship!'
stickers.caption: To our friendship

stickers.name: hoshi_angry
stickers.alt: Hoshiguma looks exceptionally angry, her mouth of sharp teeth on full display in an open mouthed scowl. She holds her shield in her right hand, ready to slice someone into ribbons. According to Xue, she says, 'HAAH?'
stickers.caption: HAAAAH?

stickers.name: group_awake
stickers.alt: Three people face the viewer, the Medic NPC on the left, Amiya in the center, and Dobermann on the right. Amiya and the Medic smile while Dobermann looks like she wants to stab someone. According to Xue, the words above them say, 'You're awake!'
stickers.caption: You're awake

stickers.name: misha_eyes
stickers.alt: Skullshatterer stands behind Misha, his middle and index fingers are used to hold Misha's eyes open. He looms over Misha, tilting her head up. Misha looks traumatized. According to Xue, the words on the right read, 'Your eyes deceive you'
stickers.caption: Your eyes deceive you

stickers.name: hoshi_amiya_cute
stickers.alt: Hoshiguma is faced away from the viewer as she blushes. In her hands are Amiya's cheeks, getting pinched and pulled on her face. Hoshiguma seems to find Amiya very cute.

stickers.name: amiya_earplug
stickers.alt: Amiya smiles menacingly as she plugs her rabbit ears with her index fingers. According to Xue, the words on the right read, 'You guys go ahead and chat'
stickers.caption: You guys go ahead and chat

stickers.name: frostnova_sing
stickers.alt: Frostnova sings with a microphone in her right hand. Her left hand holds the wire connected to the microphone, the wire disappearing beyond the bottom of the image. Mephisto is in the background, cheering her on with an orange glowstick. According to Xue, the words on the right read, 'Experience my chilling frontier!'
stickers.caption: Experience my chilling frontier

stickers.name: frostnova_amiya_quiet
stickers.alt: Amiya has a shadow over her face as she stands behind Frostnova. Amiya's right hand is clamped over Frostnova's mouth. According to Xue, the words next to them read, 'Shut it.'
stickers.caption: Shut it

stickers.name: deepcolor_glasses
stickers.alt: The image is zoomed in on Deepcolor's face. The frame only shows half of her face. She points to her eye with her left hand. A person's silhouette is reflected in her eye. According to Xue, the words to the right read, 'Have colored glasses'
stickers.caption: Have colored glasses

stickers.name: cuora_confused
stickers.alt: Cuora grins widely while looking to her right. A giant question mark next to her head indicates she's out of the loop.

stickers.name: amiya_stare
stickers.alt: Amiya stares down at something with a blank expression. According to Xue, she says, 'Mm (yes).'
stickers.caption: Mm (yes).

stickers.name: amiya_search
stickers.alt: Amiya looms over the viewer, her face covered in a dark shadow. According to Xue, she says, 'Are you here?'
stickers.caption: Are you here?

stickers.name: doctor_amiya_pat
stickers.alt: Doctor comfortingly pats the head of a fretting Amiya. According to Xue, the words above them are a 'pat pat' sound effect.
stickers.caption: SFX: pat pat

stickers.name: doctor_rise
stickers.alt: Doctor lays in bed, their hands folded on their chest. Although their face is totally obscured by their helmet, two white dots indicate their eyes are wide open and they are wake. According to Xue, the words next to them say, 'I RISE.'
stickers.caption: I RISE.

stickers.name: amiya_nah
stickers.alt: Amiya holds up her right hand, waving it side to side in polite declination. According to Xue, she says, 'That's not the case.'
stickers.caption: That's not the case.

stickers.name: amiya_think
stickers.alt: Amiya looks down in thought. She holds her chin between the thumb and index finger of her right hand, while crossing her left arm across her chest. Above her is the sound effect 'mmm...'

stickers.name: feater_complain
stickers.alt: FEater has her eyes closed in dramatic agony as she loudly complains. According to Xue, she says, 'I'm always dealing with the shit end of the stick!'
stickers.caption: I'm always dealing with the shit end of the stick

stickers.name: doctor_sleep
stickers.alt: Doctor lays in bed, their hands folded on their chest. According to Xue, the words next to them say, 'sleep like the dead.'
stickers.caption: Sleep like the dead.

stickers.name: specter_maniac
stickers.alt: The image is zoomed in on Specter's maniacal grin and red eyes. A third of the image is filled a sound effect. According to Xue, the sound effect is along the lines of 'HAHAHAHAHA!!'
stickers.caption: HAHAHAHAHA!!

stickers.name: specter_tired
stickers.alt: Specter lies face down like a starfish while holding her bonesaw in her hands. The text above her consists of the English word 'lay' and a Chinese character. According to Xue, this is a pun on 'lying down' in English and 'tired' in Chinese. Properly translated as a whole, it would be, 'passed out'
stickers.caption: Passed out.

stickers.name: myrrh_nom
stickers.alt: Myrrh chews a tuft of grass in her mouth. According to Xue, the sound effect is 'nom.'
stickers.caption: SFX: nom.

stickers.name: 12f_confused
stickers.alt: 12F looks at a smart phone in his right hand in confusion and distress. Several question marks around his head convey his struggle.

stickers.name: kal_glug
stickers.alt: Kal'tsit has her left hand on her hip while she uses her right hand to chug from a mug. According to Xue, the sound effect is 'glug glug glug.'
stickers.caption: SFX: glug glug glug

stickers.name: kal_attack
stickers.alt: Kal'tsit dramatically points to attack something while Mon3tr looms over her shoulder. A red gleam over Mon3tr's head threatens danger. According to Xue, Kal'tsit says something along the lines of, 'Get them.'
stickers.caption: Get them.

stickers.name: kal_trouble
stickers.alt: A shadow of dread falls over Kal'tsit's stoic face. A visual effect indicates that Kal'tsit has sensed someone getting into trouble that needs to be scolded.

stickers.name: admins_return
stickers.alt: Kal'tsit and Amiya walk away from the viewer. The Doctor is being dragged between them by their arms, Kal'tsit on their right and Amiya on their left. According to Xue, the words beside them read, 'Returning.'
stickers.caption: Returning.

stickers.name: silence_sus
stickers.alt: Silence glances over her shoulder with a dubious expression. According to Xue, the words along the left read, 'What are you doing?'
stickers.caption: What are you doing

stickers.name: ptilo_shock
stickers.alt: Ptilopsis has her eyes wide open like she's been surprised. According to Xue, the words along the left read, 'Shocked'
stickers.caption: Shocked

stickers.name: ifrit_gremlin
stickers.alt: Ifrit grins mischieviously as she holds a test tube in her left hand and what seems to be a flask in her right hand. According to Xue, the words along the top read, 'Causing an accident'
stickers.caption: Causing an accident

stickers.name: kal_interest
stickers.alt: Kal'tsit has a mug in her right hand while she holds her chin with her left in thought. Her interest seems to be piqued. According to Xue, the words beside Kal'tsit read, 'Is that so?'
stickers.caption: Is that so

stickers.name: silence_carefree
stickers.alt: Silence holds a round flask with a sprout and soil inside. Her eyes are closed and her mouth is open, as if caught blinking in the middle of an explanation. According to Xue, the words along the left read, 'Feeling carefree.'
stickers.caption: Feeling carefree

stickers.name: ptilo_trouble
stickers.alt: Ptilopsis takes on a grave and determined expression upon learning something surprising. She has her staff in her left hand and papers in her right. According to Xue, the words along the right read, 'Aw crap.'
stickers.caption: Aw crap.

stickers.name: ifrit_here
stickers.alt: The image is very zoomed in to focus on Ifrit's face. Her expression is fanatically crazed, and her mouth is wide open in a grin. According to Xue, the words along the bottom read, 'HERE!!!'
stickers.caption: HERE!!!

stickers.name: kal_silence
stickers.alt: Kal'tsit holds her chin with her left hand and a mug in her right. Her eyes are closed in thought. Whatever she's thinking of, it's causing her to sweat nervously. There is text along the top that consists solely of two ellipses of silence.

stickers.name: croissant_wink
stickers.alt: The image is zoomed in on Croissant's face, winking with her right eye. She has a toothy grin. According to Xue, the words along the bottom read, 'Leave it to me!'
stickers.caption: Leave it to me

stickers.name: hoshi_hey
stickers.alt: The image is zoomed in on Hoshiguma's face. Her eyes are wide and her pupils are vertical slits. Her smile is wider than usual, showing her razor sharp teeth. According to Xue, the words along the top read, 'Hey hey.'
stickers.caption: Hey hey

stickers.name: chen_yum
stickers.alt: Ch'en has her mouth open in the middle of taking a bite out of something in her hand. According to Xue, the words along the left read, 'Yummy!!'
stickers.caption: Yummy!!

stickers.name: wei_ok
stickers.alt: Wei Yenwu has a smugly pleased expression as he leans into his right elbow on a table. His smoking pipe is also in his right hand. According to Xue, the words along the left read, 'I think it is ok.'
stickers.caption: I think it is ok

stickers.name: croissant_fish
stickers.alt: Croissant holds a tray with both hands. A raw fish is about to fall onto the tray. According to Xue, the words along the bottom read, 'Eating meat~'
stickers.caption: Eating meat~

stickers.name: hoshi_hoh
stickers.alt: Hoshiguma looks apprehensive, like she just heard something she didn't particularly like. Her mouth is partially open as sweat beads on her face. According to Xue, the word on the left reads, 'Hoh.'
stickers.caption: Hoh

stickers.name: chen_surprise
stickers.alt: Ch'en is caught off-guard in the middle of eating something in her right hand.

stickers.name: wei_smug
stickers.alt: Wei Yenwu leans into on his right elbow on a table while holding his smoking pipe. He has a deviously smug expression. According to Xue, the words along the left read, 'Yeah, can ya?'
stickers.caption: Yeah, can ya

stickers.name: amiya_sheepish
stickers.alt: Amiya smiles sheepishly with only her right eye closed. Two bandaids are on her head, forming a cross. She reaches up for the back of her head with her left arm, adding to her sheepishness. According to Xue, the words along the bottom read, 'Ehe :star:'
stickers.caption: Ehe ☆

stickers.name: amiya_confused
stickers.alt: Amiya reaches up for the back her head with her left arm, two bandaids forming a cross on her right side of her head. Her expression is unsure. According to Xue, the words along the left read, 'What just happened?'
stickers.caption: What just happened

stickers.name: amiya_tear
stickers.alt: Amiya reaches up for the back her head with her left arm, two bandaids forming a cross on her right side of her head. She has her eyes closed with tears leaking from her eyes as she smiles awkwardly. According to Xue, the word at the top left corner reads, 'Oh.'
stickers.caption: Oh.

stickers.name: lappland_best
stickers.alt: Lappland winks with her left eye. She has a cocky grin with her left fist on her hip and her right arm extended holding her sword. According to Xue, the words in the top left corner reads, 'Best'
stickers.caption: Best

stickers.name: texas_rush
stickers.alt: Texas carries a large box with a smaller, flat box on top. She breaks out into a sweat while running. According the Xue, the text along the left reads, 'Coming!!'
stickers.caption: Coming!!

stickers.name: texas_fall
stickers.alt: Texas has her eyes closed as the image zooms in on her face, implying that she tripped. She appears to be holding two boxes in her arms, although her arms have been cut out of frame. According to Xue, the word in the top left reads, 'AH!'
stickers.caption: AH!

stickers.name: exusiai_yo
stickers.alt: Exusiai wears a smug expression as she holds a Penguin Logisitics tablet or clipboard in her left hand. She holds something shaped like a thick pen in her right hand. According to Xue, the word in the top left corner reads, 'Yo.'
stickers.caption: Yo

stickers.name: exusiai_work
stickers.alt: Exusiai's tongue sticks out at the corner of her mouth, conveying mischieviousness. She's holding something shaped like a thick pen in her right hand and a board in her right. According to an uncertain Xue, the words along the left probably read, 'You haven't worked yourself to death yet?'
stickers.caption: You haven't worked yourself to death yet?

stickers.name: kaltsit_doctor
stickers.alt: Kal'tsit wears a stethoscope on her cat ears. She stoically holds out the chest piece of the stethoscope, as if pressing it against someone's chest. According to Xue, the words along the bottom read, 'I doubt you're sick'
stickers.caption: I doubt you're sick

stickers.name: kaltsit_disapprove
stickers.alt: Kal'tsit wears a stethoscope as the image zooms in on her face. She's wearing a disapproving expression. According the Xue, the words along the bottom read, 'Any objections?'
stickers.caption: Any objections?

stickers.name: chen_boss
stickers.alt: Ch'en has her mouth open like she's in the middle of talking hastily about something. Her arms are crossed and her left eye is closed. It seems like she's sitting in a chair with a backrest. According to Xue, the words along the top read, 'Yeah, yeah, go ahead.'
stickers.caption: Yeah, yeah, go ahead

stickers.name: chen_disapprove
stickers.alt: Ch'en seems to be glaring at something with her arms crossed. According to Xue, the words along the bottom read, 'Every time you open your mouth, it's trouble.'
stickers.caption: Every time you open your mouth, it's trouble

stickers.name: emperor_tired
stickers.alt: Emperor seems to be laying down or heavily reclined as the bottom of his beak is visible. A snot bubble is forming from his nostril, signifying he is asleep. According to Xue, the words along the left read, 'Exhausted'
stickers.caption: Exhausted

stickers.name: misha_sulk
stickers.alt: Misha seems to be curled up while sitting on the floor, although the frame is cut off at around her chest. There's a bandaid on her right cheek, and a speech bubble indicates her silence. According to Xue, the words along the right possibly read, 'Go away.'
stickers.caption: Go away.

stickers.name: amiya_cute
stickers.alt: Bunny Amiya admires something above her. She holds her cheeks with both hands as sparkles surround her, conveying her awe.

stickers.name: amiya_glance
stickers.alt: Bunny Amiya stands on all four legs, glancing behind her toward the viewer.

stickers.name: amiya_flustered
stickers.alt: Bunny Amiya holds her cheeks with both hands while looking downward. She appears to be nervously sweating, giving a sense that she's flustered over something.

stickers.name: amiya_cry
stickers.alt: Bunny Amiya sits while bawling. A carrot with a bite taken out of it and some carrot crumbs lay in front of her.

stickers.name: amiya_squish
stickers.alt: Bunny Amiya squishes her left cheek.

stickers.name: amiya_smile
stickers.alt: Bunny Amiya sits while smiling, appearing to have a good time.

stickers.name: amiya_behind
stickers.alt: Bunny Amiya stands on all four legs while looking directly away from the viewer. Her right ear is faced backwards towards the viewer with a twitching motion, implying that she can hear you behind her.

stickers.name: amiya_sneeze
stickers.alt: Bunny Amiya appears to have been caught mid-sneeze. She sits with her eyes closed and her mouth hidden behind the tuff of fur on her chest.

stickers.name: amiya_windy
stickers.alt: Bunny Amiya stands on two legs. She appears to be trying to face the right side of the image, but is blown toward the left by a strong wind. Her fur, jacket, and arms are pushed left and upward.

stickers.name: amiya_jump
stickers.alt: Bunny Amiya appears to be mid-jump, jumping down from somewhere high with a worried expression.

stickers.name: amiya
stickers.alt: The image is zoomed in on the face of Bunny Amiya. Her eyes have shrunken down to little black dots instead of the usual blue ovals. Her mouth is closed and positioned much higher than usual, making it appear like she has a face that is too small for her head. Her arms appear to be held up and reached out for something.

stickers.name: amiya_blush
stickers.alt: A portrait of Bunny Amiya while pink flowers surround her. There is a blush on her cheeks.

stickers.name: amiya_confused
stickers.alt: Bunny Amiya sits while looking toward the left side of the image. The viewer sees her from profile while question marks indicate her confusion.

stickers.name: amiya_fallen
stickers.alt: Bunny Amiya is lying down, not looking so hot. Her eyes are closed and the shadow of sickness sits between her eyebrows. A bunny-shaped soul with a halo appears to be departing from Bunny Amiya's body.

stickers.name: amiya_scared
stickers.alt: Bunny Amiya sits and trembles in fright while a end of carrot sits in her mouth. Her ears are flattened against her head.

stickers.name: amiya_pillow
stickers.alt: Bunny Amiya falls backwards onto a pillow, pushing air out of it.

stickers.name: amiya_flustered
stickers.alt: A gif of Bunny Amiya where she tries to hide her blushing face behind her paws with her eyes closed. The animation begins with her popping her head up and looking at the viewer nervously. Flustered, she breaks eye contact and looks away to the side before progressivly moving her face downward until she's hiding her face behind her paws again.

stickers.name: amiya_glance
stickers.alt: A gif of Bunny Amiya where she jumps around in circles.

stickers.name: amiya_smile
stickers.alt: A gif of Bunny Amiya being happy and enjoying life. She sits while swaying her head from side to side. She also has her hands on her feet, moving the top of her feet side to side.

stickers.name: amiya_bounce
stickers.alt: A gif of Bunny Amiya jumping down from somewhere above the frame. She bounces and rolls forward before landing, sitting on her bottom.
